subject: Attention:   ,
body:
Attention:   ,
Good day and happy new year! to you and family! We wish to know if you were among those that received their funds last week? Otherwise, you are required to forward this form filled back to the paying bank with the email below and remind them that you were supposed to be among those to receive their funds last week and you want to know why your funds have not been released.
 
Ms Nomfundo (Fundi)Tshazibana(The Deputy Governor SARB)
Tele: +27717094284
FAX:+27865710389
Email:info@sarb-portal.co.za
CHIEF FINANCE OFFICER(SARB)
 
Congratulations once Again.
 
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Co-ordine

subject: Re:   Attention:   ,
body:
Hello Morgan,

Happy New Year to you too! I hope this year brings you lots of joy and prosperity. 

Regarding your message, I'm not quite sure what funds you're referring to. Could you please provide more details about these funds? What are they for and why was I supposed to receive them last week?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes.

Best wishes,
Wilson

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Attention Wilson    ,

Congratulations! on the winning of sum of  the total Sum of  $840 000.00
(Eight Hundred and Forty Thousand United States First Category draws of
E-MAIL LOTTERY organized sponsor by the  South African Governments South
African Government in conjunction with the National LOTTERY & Grants
disbursement Unit,to promote entrepreneurship among her citizens and beyond
to aid the well being of the global citizens.

We write to to inform you that we are in receipt of your winning details
supplied to us this morning in this office by you for the claim of your
winning prize money, we wish to congratulate you that the winning
information you provided to this office perfectly corresponded with the
details we have in our system which proves that your email (id) is  one of
the rightful winner's. Please note; we pay all the approved winners through
Bank to Bank transfer or through a loaded ATM VISA and MASTER CARD ) and we
have ordered our paying bank in South Africa" for the immediate release of
your winning fund to you once you pay for the obtaining of the document
called THE VITAL PCH FORM which has been mandated by the Government of
South Africa alongside other organizing bodies to ascertain that a due
process is followed in disbursing the winning Sum to the rightful
beneficiaries without hitches.

We have issued a Letter of Credit to South Africa Reserve Bank (SARB) to
expedite action in crediting your winning sum to you. You are expected to
contact the Deputy Governor Reserve Bank of South African in the person of
 Mr. Kuben Naidoo.

South Africa Reserve Bank (SARB)
Mr. Kuben Naidoo
Email: info_reservebank@sarbinfo.org
Email: info.reservebank@sarbinfo.org
Tele:+27827056900
Fax: +27865710389

We would like to inform you that it is obligatory that you keep us posted
on every step in having your funds released to you to enable us to advise
you on the right steps to follow.

Congratulations once Again.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Coordinate)

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Hello Morgan,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I've won such a large sum. It's like a dream come true. 

I'm curious about the process though. Could you please explain more about this VITAL PCH FORM? What exactly does it entail and why is it necessary for the transfer of my winnings?

Also, could you tell me more about Mr. Kuben Naidoo? How will he assist in this process?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Wilson

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Attention Wilson    ,

Your email has been received talking about VITAL PCH FORM, i would advise
that you contact the paying bank regarding the importance of the PCH FORM
but for all know, it is the criteria by which every beneficiaries received
their funds in other words, it is a release document while Mr. Kuben is the
banker responsible in the release and transfer of your funds.

South Africa Reserve Bank (SARB)
Mr. Kuben Naidoo
Email: info_reservebank@sarbinfo.org
Email: info.reservebank@sarbinfo.org
Tele:+27827056900
Fax: +27865710389

We would like to inform you that it is obligatory that you keep us posted
on every step in having your funds released to you to enable us to advise
you on the right steps to follow.

Congratulations once Again.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Coordinate)

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Hello Morgan,

Thank you for your prompt response and the information provided. I'm a bit confused about this whole process, could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? What exactly is the role of Mr. Kuben Naidoo in this process? And how does the South Africa Reserve Bank SARB fit into all of this?

I appreciate your patience and assistance.

Best wishes,
Wilson

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Attention Wilson    ,

Like i said before,the man Mr. Kuben is a banker responsible in having your
funds released to your account but if you are not comfortable writing him,
you can rather contact the lady  Ms Nomfundo (Fundi)Tshazibana they are all
in the-same bank and they are responsible in having your funds released
into your account and i will appreciate if you will contact her immediately
for more information there is nothing to be scared of because this
transaction is risk free.

South Africa Reserve Bank
Mr. Kuben Naidoo: Email:adminreservebank@sarbinfo.org
Ms Nomfundo (Fundi)Tshazibana: info@sarb-portal.co.za
Email: info_reservebank@sarbinfo.org
Tele:+27827056900
Fax: +27865710389

We would like to inform you that it is obligatory that you keep us posted
on every step in having your funds released to you to enable us to advise
you on the right steps to follow.

Congratulations once Again.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Coordinate)

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Hello Morgan,

Thank you for your message. It's really exciting to hear about the funds being released into my account. I'm a bit confused though, should I contact Mr. Kuben Naidoo or Ms Nomfundo Fundi Tshazibana? And what exactly do they need from me to proceed with this process?

Also, could you please tell me more about how this works? How did these funds come to be in my name and why are they being released now? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Wilson

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Attention: Wilson,

Your email was received, once again we believed that there was a message
you received before you contacted us and that message should have explained
these things to you but if you are not clear, do contact the paying bank
and request for more explanation.

It is your right to require more information regarding your about to
receive funding. But if i may proceed further in the explanation, your
email address was selected among those to receive the payment given that
this is a microsoft  sponsored pay-out also *your lucky winning numbers
falls within our Afro booklet representative office payable through South
African Reserve Bank.*

Congratulations once Again.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Co-ordinate

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Hello Morgan,

Thank you for your email. I'm thrilled to hear about this opportunity! However, I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details. Could you please explain more about how my email address was selected and what these lucky winning numbers mean? 

Also, could you provide more information on how the payment process works through the South African Reserve Bank? I'm not very familiar with international banking procedures.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Wilson

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:
Attention: Wilson,

Make me believe that you are not here for a joke because we do not have
such time if not, do contact the paying bank for more information.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Morgan
(Agent and Co-ordinate

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:

Thank you for your message. I understand the importance of time and assure you that I am not here for a joke. Could you please provide me with more information about this paying bank? What is it exactly that they do? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,

subject: Re: Attention: ,
body:

I hope you're doing well. I'm quite interested in the information you have to share. Could you please elaborate more on it? I'm all ears and ready to learn.
